name: Low Yiyiu
description:
I'm Low Yiyiu from Malaysia.
I'm a developer at wwwavy. Check out some of my side projects below.

education.name: MSc in Computing

education.name: Diploma in ICT with specialism in Software Engineering
education.institution: Asia Pacific University of Technology and Innovation

projects.name: EasyRunes
projects.description:
EasyRunes automate runes selection process for League of Legends.
Built with Electron with data from Riot's API and KoreanBuilds.
Data is stored as JSON for easier update.

projects.name: Placeholder
projects.description: Dynamically renders image placeholders on the server side using PHP with customisation for dimension, type, background and font.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description:
Current page. Simple portfolio page built with JSX and TailwindCSS.
Data is stored as JSON for easier maintenance.

projects.name: FiftyFifty
projects.description:
FiftyFifty, submit two links and receive a permalink where you can share it to someone and they will have a 50-50 chance of opening either one of the link.
Inspired by r/FiftyFifty and Degstu.
This page's backend is PHP and the data is stored in a SQL database.
